abstract: A worldly offering by Howard Barkin, the 2016 champion of the American Crossword Puzzle Tournament.
snippet: A worldly offering by Howard Barkin, the 2016 champion of the American Crossword Puzzle Tournament.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY PUZZLE — If you like new toys as much as I do, you probably had a lot of fun the first time you encountered GOOGLE EARTH. The part I liked best was finding my HOUSE (which was a bit creepy at first), and then whooshing outward from my BLOCK to a view of the entire planet.
